databaseConfig.sql: select MS_KANIDOUSEI_INFO_SHUBETU_ID , KANIDOUSEI_INFO_SHUBETU_NAME , DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS from MS_KANIDOUSEI_INFO_SHUBETU where (MS_KANIDOUSEI_INFO_SHUBETU.DELETE_FLAG = 0 or MS_KANIDOUSEI_INFO_SHUBETU.DELETE_FLAG is NULL)

INSERT INTO MS_KANIDOUSEI_INFO_SHUBETU ( MS_KANIDOUSEI_INFO_SHUBETU_ID , KANIDOUSEI_INFO_SHUBETU_NAME , DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :MS_KANIDOUSEI_INFO_SHUBETU_ID , :KANIDOUSEI_INFO_SHUBETU_NAME , :DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_KANIDOUSEI_INFO_SHUBETU SET KANIDOUSEI_INFO_SHUBETU_NAME = :KANIDOUSEI_INFO_SHUBETU_NAME , DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_KANIDOUSEI_INFO_SHUBETU_ID = :MS_KANIDOUSEI_INFO_SHUBETU_ID AND TS = :TS
